name: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies
description: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies by Dynasty Seeds is a labor of love that began in 2014. This strain crosses a potent Platinum Girl Scout Cookies mother plant and Dynasty’s own Oregon Huckleberry father. The hybrid of these two strains offers growers higher yields, better internodal spacing, and a complexity of flavor few strains achieve. Its aroma is sour berries and mint while the flavor is hashy and floral. Platinum Huckleberry Cookies stimulates the mind with a rush of euphoria and crests into a full-body couchlock.
descriptionPlain: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies by Dynasty Seeds is a labor of love that began in 2014. This strain crosses a potent Platinum Girl Scout Cookies mother plant and Dynasty’s own Oregon Huckleberry father. The hybrid of these two strains offers growers higher yields, better internodal spacing, and a complexity of flavor few strains achieve. Its aroma is sour berries and mint while the flavor is hashy and floral. Platinum Huckleberry Cookies stimulates the mind with a rush of euphoria and crests into a full-body couchlock.

highlightedReviews.text: Platinum Huckleberry Cookies is a nice looking, tasty strain with colorful buds and loaded with trichomes! The high is a nicely balanced hybrid high that soars like a sativa but is nice and social at the onset then mellows to a comfortable indica narcotic effect later. Great for pain, anxiety, relaxation, lack of appetite, depression, and spasms.

Platinum Huckleberry Cookies is a favorite of mine for managing anxiety, especially social anxiety, migraines, and depression. In smaller doses it can aid in the creative process, help with some chronic pain, and make socializing even more enjoyable. In lager doses it can have you gleefully staring at blank wall (or help with insomnia). 
I've found this strain to be a definite creeper, with a stony high, and lots of euphoria. Definitely worth a try!
